snippet: Jan Böhmermann, 34, a late-night television host, may be Germany’s best hope for puncturing the enduring stereotype of the humorless Teuton.
abstract: Saturday Profile of German comic Jan Bohmermann, who was tapped to host show Neo Magazin Royale in February and has since won accolades and decent ratings; Bohmermann faces challenge of drawing German youth back to network television, and faces additional challenge of puncturing stereotype of Germans as humorless people.
lead_paragraph: Jan Böhmermann, 34, a late-night television host, may be Germany’s best hope for puncturing the enduring stereotype of the humorless Teuton.

headline.print_headline: Comic’s Task: Getting Young Germans to Log Off, Tune In and Laugh Out Loud
headline.main: Comic’s Task: Get Young Germans to Log Off, Tune In and Laugh Out Loud
